QAPair.Question: What is (are) Chronic pain - resources ?
QAPair.Answer: The following organizations are good resources for information on chronic pain: American Chronic Pain Association -- www.acpanow.com , Centers for Disease Control and Prevention -- www.cdc.gov/chronicdisease/center/news-media/archives/features/living-well.html , US National Library of Medicine, MedlinePlus -- medlineplus.gov/chronicpain.html , National Fibromyalgia & Chronic Pain Association -- askjan.org/disabilities/Chronic-Pain.cfm , National Institute of Neurological Disorders and Stroke -- www.ninds.nih.gov/Disorders/All-Disorders/Chronic-pain-Information-Page , National Center for Complementary and Integrative Health -- www.nccih.nih.gov/health/providers/digest/complementary-health-approaches-for-chronic-pain ,
